description: You can add a CTA through the media player page. On the 'Video Settings' menu, under 'Info & details', you can see the space to add your CTA button text and URL.
description_text: You can add a CTA through the media player page. On the 'Video Settings' menu, under 'Info & details', you can see the space to add your CTA button text and URL.
title: How to add a CTA button?
